CustomField.description: This field identifies the class to be used as a logger factory, which can be dynamically loaded using the rflib_LoggerUtil.getFactory() method. This class will then be instantiated and used to create the logger in the class.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field identifies the class to be used as a logger factory, which can be dynamically loaded using the rflib_LoggerUtil.getFactory() method. This class will then be instantiated and used to create the logger in the class.
CustomField.label: Logger Factory Class
